org.apache.james.transport.matchers
Class SenderInFakeDomain

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.mailet.GenericMatcher
      org.apache.james.transport.matchers.AbstractNetworkMatcher
          org.apache.james.transport.matchers.SenderInFakeDomain
All Implemented Interfaces:
Matcher, MatcherConfig
public class SenderInFakeDomain
extends AbstractNetworkMatcher

Does a DNS lookup (MX and A/CNAME records) on the sender's domain. If there are no entries, the domain is considered fake and the match is successful.

This method is declared abstract so subclasses must override it.
